TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CompilerGeneratedAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Distinguishes a compiler-generated element from a user-generated element. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Apply the CompilerGeneratedAttribute attribute to any application element to indicate that the element is generated by a compiler.
Use the CompilerGeneratedAttribute attribute to determine whether an element is added by a compiler or authored directly in source code.
This attribute allows SQL server to reference compiler-generated static values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
